org.apache.twill.api.logging

Interface LogEntry


  • public interface LogEntry
    Represents a log entry emitted by application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LogEntry.Level
      Log level.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFileName()
      Returns the source file name where the log emitted.
      String getHost()
      Returns hostname of where the log emitted.
      int getLineNumber()
      Returns the line number in the source file where the log emitted.
      String getLoggerName()
      Returns name of the logger.
      LogEntry.Level getLogLevel()
      Returns the log LogEntry.Level of the log.
      String getMessage()
      Returns the log message.
      String getRunnableName()
      Returns the runnable name.
      String getSourceClassName()
      Returns the class name where the log emitted.
      String getSourceMethodName()
      Returns the method name where the log emitted.
      StackTraceElement[] getStackTraces()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getThrowable() instead.
      String getThreadName()
      Returns the name of the thread where the log emitted.
      LogThrowable getThrowable()
      Returns the Throwable information emitted with the log.
      long getTimestamp()
      Returns timestamp of the log.

        Returns name of the logger.

        Returns hostname of where the log emitted.

        Returns timestamp of the log.

        Returns the log LogEntry.Level of the log.

        String getSourceClassName()
        Returns the class name where the log emitted.

      • getSourceMethodName

        String getSourceMethodName()
        Returns the method name where the log emitted.

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Returns the source file name where the log emitted.

      • getLineNumber

        int getLineNumber()
        Returns the line number in the source file where the log emitted.

      • getThreadName

        String getThreadName()
        Returns the name of the thread where the log emitted.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        Returns the log message.

      • getRunnableName

        String getRunnableName()
        Returns the runnable name.

      • getThrowable

        LogThrowable getThrowable()
        Returns the Throwable information emitted with the log.
        Returns:
        A LogThrowable or null if Throwable information is not available.

      • getStackTraces

        @Deprecated
StackTraceElement[] getStackTraces()
        Deprecated. Use getThrowable() instead.
        Returns the stack trace of the throwable information emitted with the log.
        Returns:
        the stack trace information or an empty array if Throwable information is not available.
